title: Simulation and Statistical Analysis-Based Instructional Methods to Improve University Faculty Digital Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Statistical Analysis and Experience with Digital Educational Tools
context.additional_context: A practice-oriented educational environment utilizing real datasets and simulation tools to enhance teachers' digital literacy competencies.

learning_goals: Learners can design a teacher digital literacy assessment model by applying logistic regression analysis.
Learners can address overfitting issues in multiple regression models through normalization transformation.
Based on simulation and statistical analysis results, learners can suggest strategies for enhancing educational competencies.

resources: Sample data on actual university instructor competency assessments

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
